dataLabel: get all 10 items with a CIViC ID
queryMap:
SPARQL `PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>

SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item wdt:P3329 ?civicid .} LIMIT 10`@START
